abilities.name: Dark Omen
abilities.description: Fire a wave of dark magic, dealing Magical Damage and marking enemies

abilities.name: Confusion
abilities.description: Create a phantom clone of yourself and become Stealthed and gain Movement Speed

abilities.name: Changeling
abilities.description: Select a God in the current match to transform into an exact copy of. Gain access to their abilities and items for 10 seconds

aspects.name: Aspect of Thunderstruck
aspects.description: Thunderstruck is always active but chains for less damage. Triggering it 3 times on a god heals Thor, slowing and trembling them. Warrior's Madness grants Protections instead of Strength. Mjolnir's Attunement no longer deals bonus return damage, and Tectonic Rift has no damage scaling.

abilities.name: Warrior's Madness
abilities.description: You gain Protections for each enemy God near you, up to 3. You always have Thunderstruck.

abilities.name: Mjolnir's Attunement
abilities.description: Throw Mjolnir forward, dealing Physical Damage to enemies as it travels. When it reaches max range it flies back to you

abilities.name: Tectonic Rift
abilities.description: Slam Mjolnir down creating a fissure, dealing Physical Damage to enemies as it erupts. Enemies hit are also Stunned

abilities.name: Berserker Barrage
abilities.description: Spin, dealing Physical Damage to enemies around you. You spin twice before unleashing a final cone attack that deals Physical Damage to enemies in front of you

abilities.name: Thor Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you

abilities.name: Warrior's Madness
abilities.description: You gain Strength for each enemy God near you, up to 3. After using Berserker's Barrage or Anvil of Dawn, you gain Thunderstruck

abilities.name: Anvil of Dawn

aspects.name: Aspect of Mangetsu
aspects.description: When gaining Shingetsu Ranged Attack, they become Mangetsu Ranged Attacks instead. Dark Moon Shuriken no longer sticks to gods. Piercing Moonlight hits each target only once for major damage in an AoE, before returning to his casting location.

abilities.name: Dark Moon Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw a Shuriken that deals Physical Damage to enemies, stopping on the first God hit

abilities.name: Kusarigama
abilities.description: Perform a 3-swing combo with a Kusarigama. The first 2 swings deal Physical Damage and Disarm enemies. The final swing deals more Damage

abilities.name: Piercing Moonlight
abilities.description: Fire 4 piercing beams of moonlight, marking and dealing Physical Damage to enemy Gods. You are CC Immune and have Damage Reduction while firing

abilities.name: Tsukuyomi Basic Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you

abilities.name: Shingetsu & Mangetsu
abilities.description: Damaging enemies empowers your twin tonfas, Shingetsu and Mangetsu

abilities.name: Dark Moon Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw a Shuriken that deals Physical Damage to enemies and sticks into the first God hit

abilities.name: Kusarigama
abilities.description: Perform a 3-swing combo with a Kusarigama. The first 2 swings deal Physical Damage and Disarm enemies. The final swing deals more Damage

abilities.name: Silver Moon Caltrops

abilities.description: Fire 4 piercing beams of moonlight, marking and dealing Physical Damage to enemy Gods. You are CC Immune and have Damage Reduction while firing

abilities.name: Ullr Basic Attack
abilities.description: Ullr's Basic Attacks change depending on his current stance

abilities.name: Weapon Master
abilities.description: When you use an ability in either stance your Cooldowns in the opposite stance are reduced

abilities.name: Wield Axes/Wield Bow
abilities.description: Change stance, Cleanse Disarms, and gain benefits depending on which stance you are in

aspects.name: Aspect of Fortification
aspects.description: Being near one of Vulcan's turrets grants Vulcan and the turret increased Protections and Health Regeneration. Backfire and Magma Bomb have lower Damage Scaling.

abilities.name: Master Craftsman
abilities.description: Vulcan has access to a variety of Mods in the item shop that affect his abilities. There are 3 sets of Mods available at different levels. You can only have 1 Mod from each set.Additionally, Hitting an enemy God with an ability grants you increased Movement Speed and Mana RegenVulcan and Turrets within 8.8 meters gain Protections and Health Regen.

abilities.name: Backfire
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that causes you to Dash back and deal Magical Damage to all enemies it hits, marking the first God that is hit

abilities.name: Magma Bomb
abilities.description: Lob a projectile that explodes on impact with the ground, dealing Magical Damage and Knocking Up enemies in the area

abilities.name: Vulcan Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit

abilities.description: Create an Inferno Cannon that shoots projectiles every 1 second at an enemy in front of it, dealing Magical Damage

abilities.name: Magma Bomb

abilities.name: Earthshaker

aspects.name: Aspect of the Nightstalker
aspects.description: Branching Bola is no longer a toggle but provides 3 fires of ability-based projectiles. Poison Darts requires less hits to deal full damage. Darkest of Nights loses existing buffs but resets Poison darts and provides increased ability damage.

abilities.name: Branching Bola
abilities.description: You next 3 Basic Attacks fire large projectiles that deal Physical damage.

abilities.name: Poison Darts
abilities.description: Fire 15 dart projectiles in a cone, dealing Physical Damage and poisoning enemies hit

abilities.name: Darkest of Nights
abilities.description: Shroud enemy gods in darkness, creating an area they cannot see out of. Using this ability resets the Cooldown of Poison Darts and during this time, your abilities deal increased damage.

abilities.name: Xbalanque Basic Attack
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit

abilities.name: Dead of Night
abilities.description: Deal damage to enemy Gods to gain stacks. Each stack provides Strength or Intelligence, whichever is higher. At 3 and 6 stacks you gain an additional buff of Strength and Intelligence

abilities.name: Branching Bola
abilities.description: While active, your Basic Attacks deal additional damage. When the bola hits a target, it splits and deals reduced damage

abilities.name: Poison Darts
abilities.description: Fire 15 dart projectiles in a cone, dealing Physical Damage and poisoning enemies hit

abilities.name: Rising Jaguar
abilities.description: Dash in the direction you are currently traveling before rising in the air, becoming CC Immune

abilities.name: Darkest of Nights
abilities.description: Shroud enemy gods in darkness, creating an area they cannot see out of. During this time you have increased Basic Attack range, Basic Attack projectile speed, Attack Speed, and Movement Speed

aspects.name: Aspect of Downpour
aspects.description: Mending Waters no longer affects allies but stops and bounces on enemy gods, dealing damage, shield damage and providing Yemoja stacking Intelligence per hit. Additionally Moonstrike no longer stuns gods but has increased Intelligence scaling.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bubble
abilities.description: Toss a bubble that bounces twice, dealing Magical Damage and Slows enemies before exploding into smaller bubbles

abilities.name: Mending Waters
abilities.description: Fire a water wave, dealing Magical Damage to enemies. This wave stops and bounces between enemy Gods.

abilities.name: River's Rebuke
abilities.description: Conjure 2 large walls of water that block enemy movement and projectiles. After a delay they crash down dealing Magical Damage, Trembling, and applying a decaying Slow to enemies hit

abilities.name: Yemoja Basic Attack
